know that uh kneading it forms the gluten which are chains kind of think of them as like elastic bands that form in the structure and that's what gives it that that bready consistency that we like the bran and the the germ and the other things that are left in the flower act like little glass shards so imagine you have a bowl full of rubber bands that you want to make the gluten right and then you throw a bunch of glass in there and you need it it cuts all those bands to bits and so you don't have that nice gluten structure that you generally would want so i've had to adapt and i still don't
